description: Designed for expedition conditions in more civilized locales, the Weather Down™ Parka provides premium warmth and protection when just walking the dog, commuting to the gym, or navigating the neighborhood feels like a trip to the arctic. With a fully taped, waterproof shell and overstuffed with loads of 650-fill down, the Weather Down also features ample pocket storage and organization, a snap-back storm hood, and a snap split side hem for added mobility.
name: Mountain Hardwear Weather Down Parka - Mens
